Services for Property Developers

[/mk_fancy_title][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1669274044846{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Property developers have a range of duties under Sections 77-81 of the Strata Titles Act with respect to setting up the management of a strata company, as well as providing a Precontractual Disclosure Statement to prospective buyers for the sale of any strata-titled lots.

This process can be challenging for any property developer who is not fully versed in the Strata Titles Act and corresponding Regulations.

In this respect, we are available to provide the following services:[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][mk_custom_list]

  • Assist developer and appointed surveyor in preparation of preliminary Strata Plan, including with regard to determination of lot boundaries and implications for future management of the scheme.
  • Examine preliminary strata plan and inform developer of any additional by-laws which might be considered conducive to fairness and orderly management of the scheme. Note – this may include referral to a strata lawyer where necessary.
  • Assist with preparation of an indicative budget of income and expenditure for the first financial year of the strata company, and proposed levied contributions.
  • Assist in obtaining quotes for required insurance for the strata scheme, to take effect from the date of ‘practical completion’.
  • Assist with preparation and convening of the ‘First Statutory General Meeting’ of the strata company.
  • Prepare draft Precontractual Disclosure Statement to assist selling agent in preparing required information for prospective buyers.
  • Thereafter assist with preparation of any ‘notifiable variations’ required to be notified to purchasers as per Section 157 of the Act.
  • Attend to any questions raised from time to time by the developer, their commissioned agents or prospective buyers referred to us by the developer or commissioned agents.
[/mk_custom_list][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][mk_fancy_title font_family=”none”]

Fee proposal

[/mk_fancy_title][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1669274670094{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]If you would like a fee proposal for any or all of the above-services, please contact our office.

Please ensure to send through the address of the scheme and any preliminary building plans that you may have which will assist us in determining the scope of work required.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
